受欢迎的开源项目 Moq 因悄悄收集数据而受到批评https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/popular-open-source-project-moq-criticized-for-quietly-collecting-data/ Wed, 09 Aug 2023 13:42:12 -0400阿克斯·夏尔马Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/popular-open-source-project-moq-criticized-for-quietly-collecting-data/ Open source project Moq (pronounced "Mock") has drawn sharp criticism for quietly including a controversial dependency in its latest release. Moq's 4.20.0 release from this week included another project, SponsorLink, which caused an uproar among open source software consumers, who likened the move to a breach of trust. [...]
谷歌每周发布 Chrome 安全更新来打击黑客https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/google/google-to-fight-hackers-with-weekly-chrome-security-updates/ Wed, 09 Aug 2023 11:30:34 -0400比尔·图拉斯GoogleSecurity https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/google/google-to-fight-hackers-with-weekly-chrome-security-updates/ Google has changed the Google Chrome security updates schedule from bi-weekly to weekly to address the growing patch gap problem that allows threat actors extra time to exploit published n-day and zero-day flaws. 针对英特尔 CPU 的新 Downfall 攻击窃取加密密钥和数据https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-downfall-attacks-on-intel-cpus-steal-encryption-keys-data/ Tue, 08 Aug 2023 13:00:00 -0400约努特·伊拉斯库Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-downfall-attacks-on-intel-cpus-steal-encryption-keys-data/ A senior research scientist at Google has devised new CPU attacks to exploit a vulnerability dubbed Downfall that affects multiple Intel microprocessor families and allows stealing passwords, encryption keys, and private data like emails, messages, or banking info from users that share the same computer.
